issues.message: Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.

Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<Akka.Actor.Address, long>>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<Akka.Actor.Address, long>'.
